target: The acorn guest house would be perfect. Shall I book it ?
context: <user> I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the south. <system> I have two that fit that description, would you prefer Chinese or Portuguese? <user> Either one. I just need it to be open on Sunday. <system> Okay, lets do the Lucky Star. Would you like a reservation? <user> I would like that. A table for 8 at 12:00. <system> I have booked a table for 8 at the Lucky Star. The reference number is IILATPJI . Is there anything else I can help you with? <user> I'm looking for a guesthouse to stay at. It should have free parking. <system>
